metadata.title: Does Renesas provide a design guide for hardware development?

sections.content:
Question:
Does Renesas provide a design guide for hardware development?
Answer:
Yes, we provide it. Please use the Hardware Design Guide (R01AN1411EJ).
Suitable Products
RX Family
